name: GULFAIR ACADEMY
about: Gulf Air Academy is the first Arabic-European EASA-approved training organization, with over 40 years of combined industry experience. Located in Athens, Greece, the academy offers a multinational atmosphere with a crew from over seven countries. We provide all types of EASA Pilot Licences using state-of-the-art teaching technologies and methods. Our facilities are equipped with modern training materials, and we ensure minimal flight delays due to Greece's favorable weather conditions, allowing flights 340 days a year. We prioritize international student support, including accommodation and immigration assistance, to help students focus on their training. Our goal is to train students to the highest standards, ensuring they achieve excellence in becoming pilots. With a commitment to safety beyond EASA requirements, we offer a comprehensive and supportive environment for aspiring pilots to launch their careers.
services:

ATPL Integrated + Accommodation
